org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security
Class AePrincipalAuthProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.security.AePrincipalAuthProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAuthorizationProvider
public class AePrincipalAuthProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeAuthorizationProvider

Authorization provider that checks if one of a subject's principals is in one of the configured allowed roles.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor with a configuration map

          Determines if a subject is authorized to perform an action on a resource by checking if the principals are in the comma-separated list of allowed roles
